summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East Prospect Street from 24th Avenue North to 25th Avenue North, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8992 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
